content: new born puppy pattern materials yarn my yarn choices the brand and shades i used are italicized yarn a brown 4-ply yarn i used a tiny amount drops nord shade 22 chestnut yarn b light lavender 4-ply yarn i used less than half ball katia soft gratté shade 67 stone grey or sub with drops alpaca shade 12 with yarn c yarn c off-white mohair i used 1 25g ball drops kid-silk shade 01 yarn d white 4-ply yarn i used 1 50g ball drops baby alpaca silk shade 1101 white or sub with drops alpaca shade 1101 white yarn e rust-brown mohair i used 1 25g ball drops kid-silk shade 33 rust plus 5 lengths of yarn f brown mohair i used 5 x 70cm approx lengths taken from 25g ball drops kid-silk shade 35 chocolate this is the website for the drops yarn - garnstudio com available from here knittedhome com this is the website for the katia soft gratté yarn - katia com if you wish to substitute try yarnsub com knitting needles pair of 3 50mm single point knitting needles i use lykke driftwood 25cm length ones you ll also need a 3 50mm circular knitting needle - this is just for holding stitches and you ll be directed when and how to use it in the pattern gauge 18-19 row and 13-14 stitches over 5cm 2in with 3 50mm needles toy filling i use uncarded toy filling out of preference which you can purchase from here - ebay co uk and here mohairbearmakingsupplies co uk extras pair 10mm brown toy safety eyes with washer backs not suitable for children under 3 years old scissors and yarn-sewing needle 28 coloured stitch markers see page 3 finished size body length not including the tail measures 23cm/ 9in long new born puppy pattern page 4 pattern notes special instructions use cable cast-on throughout w+tk bring working yarn to the front of the work slip next stitch purl-wise onto the rh needle take working yarn to the back slip coloured marker guide the slipped stitch back onto the lh needle turn the knitting = this guide is here to pull out and use together with the w+tk wrap and turn knit pattern should you to wish to use similar coloured guides to mine for ease of following especially at the making-up stage w+tp take working yarn to the back of the work slip next stitch red nose seam knit-wise onto the rh needle bring working yarn to the front slip green muzzle front the slipped stitch back onto the lh needle turn the knitting = pale turquoise muzzle w+tp wrap and turn purl baby pink ear position green foreleg pink knee bend general abbreviations blue foreleg seam k = knit lime inner foreleg p = purl pale turquoise hind leg increase = increase baby pink rear end decrease = decrease red belly to thigh turquoise under foreleg k2tog/ k3tog = knit two together/ knit three together orange breast p2tog/
